Outcome.DescriptionText: There isnt anything worth value here, besides some skeletons, which turn to be animated and attack your forces.
Your forces found recently half cleared out rooms, it seems someone beat us to it, though several things were left behind which are valuable.

Your troops burst it to a room only to find out that 2 pirate bosses were meeting here for their anual grab and smash plans. They don't seem happy to see you and scramble to their ships. Seemes things get hairy as non one knows who will attack who.

After Scouting the area, your troops find an entrance to a hidden cave and enter it. What they find is truly astonishing; It seems that the pirates have found some interesting artifacts and created a untested tech. Unfortunately, it seems that the pirate fleet left here might not let you go unharmed, unless you paid them for protection recently.
